short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to assist development by warning you about the environment you are currently on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Software Developers can easily differentiate between different environments with a customizable banner and colored favicon. This is based on the configured URLs in the options.
